Articles.Content:
Just say what you want to be drawn, but this is free and i'm an amateur so don't expect the best. Give me a picture of the craft you wish to be painted, and schedule-permitting, a picture will be here in a bit.

My current materials are markers and pens and pencils of and not of the colored variety.

If you don't specify a background, I'll put it in a solar orbit with the sun behind it with engines on.

And I have two styles, Abstract, just colors and distinct shading Andy Warhol Style, and I can also do a stylized picture of the craft.

I just got assigned an essay out of the blue on top of a science project. So, this is now out of the question because it’s the easiest to sacrifice.

Edited May 5, 2021 by Wizard Kerbal
Spellyng
